00047 CCC::CCC():
00048 m_iSYNInterval(CUDT::m_iSYNInterval),
00049 m_dPktSndPeriod(1.0),
00050 m_dCWndSize(16.0),
00051 m_iBandwidth(),
00052 m_dMaxCWndSize(),

00066 }

00068 CCC::~CCC()
00069 {

00073 void CCC::setACKTimer(const int& msINT)
00074 {
00075    m_iACKPeriod = msINT;
00076 
00077    if (m_iACKPeriod > m_iSYNInterval)
00078       m_iACKPeriod = m_iSYNInterval;
00079 }
00080 
00081 void CCC::setACKInterval(const int& pktINT)
00082 {
00083    m_iACKInterval = pktINT;
00084 }
00085 
00086 void CCC::setRTO(const int& usRTO)
00087 {
00088    m_bUserDefinedRTO = true;
00089    m_iRTO = usRTO;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void CCC::sendCustomMsg(CPacket& pkt) const
00093 {
00094    CUDT* u = CUDT::getUDTHandle(m_UDT);
00095 
00096    if (NULL != u)
00097    {
00098       pkt.m_iID = u->m_PeerID;
00099       u->m_pSndQueue->sendto(u->m_pPeerAddr, pkt);
00100    }
00101 }
00102 
00103 const CPerfMon* CCC::getPerfInfo()
00104 {
00105    try
00106    {
00107       CUDT* u = CUDT::getUDTHandle(m_UDT);
00108       if (NULL != u)
00109          u->sample(&m_PerfInfo, false);
00110    }
00111    catch (...)
00112    {
00113       return NULL;
00114    }
00115 
00116    return &m_PerfInfo;
00117 }

00149 void CCC::setUserParam(const char* param, const int& size)
00150 {
00151    delete [] m_pcParam;
00152    m_pcParam = new char[size];
00153    memcpy(m_pcParam, param, size);
00154    m_iPSize = size;
00155 }

00159 m_iRCInterval(),
00160 m_LastRCTime(),

00172 
00173 void CUDTCC::init()
00174 {
00175    m_iRCInterval = m_iSYNInterval;
00176    m_LastRCTime = CTimer::getTime();
00177    setACKTimer(m_iRCInterval);
00178 
00179    m_bSlowStart = true;
00180    m_iLastAck = m_iSndCurrSeqNo;
00181    m_bLoss = false;
00182    m_iLastDecSeq = CSeqNo::decseq(m_iLastAck);
00183    m_dLastDecPeriod = 1;
00184    m_iAvgNAKNum = 0;
00185    m_iNAKCount = 0;
00186    m_iDecRandom = 1;
00187 
00188    m_dCWndSize = 16;
00189    m_dPktSndPeriod = 1;
00190 }
00191 
00192 void CUDTCC::onACK(const int32_t& ack)
00193 {
00194    int64_t B = 0;
00195    double inc = 0;
00196 
00197    uint64_t currtime = CTimer::getTime();
00198    if (currtime - m_LastRCTime < (uint64_t)m_iRCInterval)
00199       return;
00200 
00201    m_LastRCTime = currtime;
00202 
00203    if (m_bSlowStart)
00204    {
00205       m_dCWndSize += CSeqNo::seqlen(m_iLastAck, ack);
00206       m_iLastAck = ack;
00207 
00208       if (m_dCWndSize > m_dMaxCWndSize)
00209       {
00210          m_bSlowStart = false;
00211          if (m_iRcvRate > 0)
00212             m_dPktSndPeriod = 1000000.0 / m_iRcvRate;
00213          else
00214             m_dPktSndPeriod = m_dCWndSize / (m_iRTT + m_iRCInterval);
00215       }
00216    }
00217    else
00218       m_dCWndSize = m_iRcvRate / 1000000.0 * (m_iRTT + m_iRCInterval) + 16;
00219 
00220    // During Slow Start, no rate increase
00221    if (m_bSlowStart)
00222       goto RATE_LIMIT;
00223 
00224    if (m_bLoss)
00225    {
00226       m_bLoss = false;
00227       goto RATE_LIMIT;
00228    }
00229 
00230    B = (int64_t)(m_iBandwidth - 1000000.0 / m_dPktSndPeriod);
00231    if ((m_dPktSndPeriod > m_dLastDecPeriod) && ((m_iBandwidth / 9) < B))
00232       B = m_iBandwidth / 9;
00233    if (B <= 0)
00234       inc = 1.0 / m_iMSS;
00235    else
00236    {
00237       // inc = max(10 ^ ceil(log10( B * MSS * 8 ) * Beta / MSS, 1/MSS)
00238       // Beta = 1.5 * 10^(-6)
00239 
00240       inc = pow(10.0, ceil(log10(B * m_iMSS * 8.0))) * 0.0000015 / m_iMSS;
00241 
00242       if (inc < 1.0/m_iMSS)
00243          inc = 1.0/m_iMSS;
00244    }
00245 
00246    m_dPktSndPeriod = (m_dPktSndPeriod * m_iRCInterval) / (m_dPktSndPeriod * inc + m_iRCInterval);
00247 
00248 
00249 RATE_LIMIT:
00250    //set maximum transfer rate
00251    if ((NULL != m_pcParam) && (m_iPSize == 8))
00252    {
00253       int64_t maxSR = *(int64_t*)m_pcParam;
00254       if (maxSR <= 0)
00255          return;
00256 
00257       double minSP = 1000000.0 / (double(maxSR) / m_iMSS);
00258       if (m_dPktSndPeriod < minSP)
00259          m_dPktSndPeriod = minSP;
00260    }
00261 }
00262 
00263 void CUDTCC::onLoss(const int32_t* losslist, const int&)
00264 {
00265    //Slow Start stopped, if it hasn't yet
00266    if (m_bSlowStart)
00267    {
00268       m_bSlowStart = false;
00269       if (m_iRcvRate > 0)
00270          m_dPktSndPeriod = 1000000.0 / m_iRcvRate;
00271       else
00272          m_dPktSndPeriod = m_dCWndSize / (m_iRTT + m_iRCInterval);
00273    }
00274 
00275    m_bLoss = true;
00276 
00277    if (CSeqNo::seqcmp(losslist[0] & 0x7FFFFFFF, m_iLastDecSeq) > 0)
00278    {
00279       m_dLastDecPeriod = m_dPktSndPeriod;
00280       m_dPktSndPeriod = ceil(m_dPktSndPeriod * 1.125);
00281 
00282       m_iAvgNAKNum = (int)ceil(m_iAvgNAKNum * 0.875 + m_iNAKCount * 0.125);
00283       m_iNAKCount = 1;
00284       m_iDecCount = 1;
00285 
00286       m_iLastDecSeq = m_iSndCurrSeqNo;
00287 
00288       // remove global synchronization using randomization
00289       srand(m_iLastDecSeq);
00290       m_iDecRandom = (int)ceil(m_iAvgNAKNum * (double(rand()) / RAND_MAX));
00291       if (m_iDecRandom < 1)
00292          m_iDecRandom = 1;
00293    }
00294    else if ((m_iDecCount ++ < 5) && (0 == (++ m_iNAKCount % m_iDecRandom)))
00295    {
00296       // 0.875^5 = 0.51, rate should not be decreased by more than half within a congestion period
00297       m_dPktSndPeriod = ceil(m_dPktSndPeriod * 1.125);
00298       m_iLastDecSeq = m_iSndCurrSeqNo;
00299    }
00300 }
00301 
00302 void CUDTCC::onTimeout()
00303 {
00304    if (m_bSlowStart)
00305    {
00306       m_bSlowStart = false;
00307       if (m_iRcvRate > 0)
00308          m_dPktSndPeriod = 1000000.0 / m_iRcvRate;
00309       else
00310          m_dPktSndPeriod = m_dCWndSize / (m_iRTT + m_iRCInterval);
00311    }
00312    else
00313    {
00314       /*
00315       m_dLastDecPeriod = m_dPktSndPeriod;
00316       m_dPktSndPeriod = ceil(m_dPktSndPeriod * 2);
00317       m_iLastDecSeq = m_iLastAck;
00318       */
00319    }
00320 }
